title: Ears treatment wheat with application maps / agrirouter Data Exchange

tasks.task: Operating an arable farm with precision agriculture tools
subtasks: Cultivating potatoes for French fries and chips
Growing cereals, winter wheat, sugar beet, winter rape, and carrots
Using Zavio software to create plant protection and fertilization tasks
Selecting plant protection products and adjusting application rates based on crop density
Utilizing satellite images for application map creation
Sending application maps to the Agrarouter for data transfer
Communicating with employees via MyAmaRouter app and wireless LAN
Verifying completed tasks and retrieving as-applied maps from Agrarouter
Monitoring and managing field operations using farm management software
Collaborating with students and field companies for data transfer support
